name: Tumblr Icons | Spain NT ( by sergioramos )
description:
Gerard Pique, Sergio Ramos, Fernando Torres, Jesus Navas, David Villa, Cesc Fabregas, and Iker Casillas in tumblr 'new post' icons.
Will look something like this in the end: http://i25.tinypic.com/3483i11.jpg.


All questions/comments/concerns/requests should be directed to kingofthecrossroads.tumblr.com
